CARIN Consumer Realtime Pharmacy Benefit Check - Local Development build (v0.1.15). See the Directory of published versions

TOCHome / Terminology

Terminology


Value Sets

  • CARIN RTPBC Billing Unit Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Country Code Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Coverage Summary Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Error Code Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Event Type Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Type Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Pharmacy Type Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC Prescribable Product Code Value Set
  • CARIN RTPBC State and Province Code Value Set


Code Systems

Code systems defined for use in the consumer Real-time Prescription Benefit Check (RTPBC) process

The following code systems define consumer-friendly insurance coverage concepts for use in RTPBC responses:

  • CARIN RTPBC Coverage Summary Code System
  • CARIN RTPBC Event Type Code System
  • CARIN RTPBC Patient Pay Type Code System
Placeholder code systems

The CodeSystem resources below are intended to serve as temporary placeholders in this guide for proposed HL7/FHIR code system URLs.

  • Placeholder NDC-11 Code System HL7/FHIR URL is in process of being established. Preliminary: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/ndc-11
  • Placeholder Canadian Province Code System proposed


Naming Systems

Licensed code and identifier systems maintained by the National Council for Prescription Drug Programs (NCPDP)
  • NCPDP Provider ID
  • NCPDP Reject Code (511-FB)
  • NCPDP Unit of Measure (600-28)
  • NCPDP Pharmacy Type (955-HR)
